channel.title: Sam Altman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sam Altman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: OpenAI Finally Launched GPT-5. Here's Everything You Need to Know
item.description: OpenAI released GPT-5 on Thursday to both free users of ChatGPT and paying subscribers.

item.title: OpenAI Finally Launched GPT-5. Here's Everything You Need to Know
item.description: OpenAI released GPT-5 on Thursday to both free users of ChatGPT and paying subscribers.

item.title: OpenAI Announces Massive US Government Partnership
item.description: The ChatGPT maker is providing its frontier AI models to federal agencies for $1 for the next year.

item.title: OpenAI Announces Massive US Government Partnership
item.description: The ChatGPT maker is providing its frontier AI models to federal agencies for $1 for the next year.

item.title: What JD Vance, Pam Bondi, and Sam Altman Can’t Stop Listening To, According to the ‘Panama Playlists’
item.description: A new website claims to know the Spotify listening habits of Trump officials, tech leaders—and even journalists. Attorney General Pam Bondi allegedly jams out to Nelly’s “Hot in Herre."

item.title: What JD Vance, Pam Bondi, and Sam Altman Can’t Stop Listening To, According to the ‘Panama Playlists’
item.description: A new website claims to know the Spotify listening habits of Trump officials, tech leaders—and even journalists. Attorney General Pam Bondi allegedly jams out to Nelly’s “Hot in Herre."

item.title: OpenAI’s most capable AI model, GPT-5, may be coming in August
item.description: Sources say new model combines o3 reasoning with general GPT capabilities.

item.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
item.description: “Easy to throw around numbers, but this is a gigantic infrastructure project.”

item.title: OpenAI Seeks Additional Capital From Investors as Part of Its $40 Billion Round
item.description: OpenAI, which recently announced a $40 billion round of financing, is seeking funding from new and existing investors to fulfill the deal.

item.title: OpenAI Seeks Additional Capital From Investors as Part of Its $40 Billion Round
item.description: OpenAI, which recently announced a $40 billion round of financing, is seeking funding from new and existing investors to fulfill the deal.

item.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
item.description: Ex-Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

item.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
item.description: Ex-Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

item.title: ChatGPT’s new AI agent can browse the web and create PowerPoint slideshows
item.description: New “agentic” AI feature combines web browsing with task-execution abilities.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.
